video.title: The Batman
video.synopsis: This Emmy-winning cartoon centers on Batman's early years as sworn protector of Gotham City, with actor Adam West (who portrayed the Caped Crusader in the classic 1960s television series "Batman") swooping in as the voice of the city's mayor.

episodes.synopsis: When the Joker frees the inmates of a mental asylum and plans a poisonous explosion of laughing gas, Batman gets serious about stopping the lunacy.
episodes.title: The Bat in the Belfry

episodes.synopsis: When mobsters hire a contract killer to eliminate Batman, Gotham's hero must fight a villain made indomitable by a performance-enhancing formula.
episodes.title: Traction

episodes.synopsis: When Penguin tries to reclaim his family's lost wealth by training birds to act as jewel thieves, Batman stands to lose his own treasure: Alfred.
episodes.title: Call of the Cobblepot

episodes.synopsis: When a power-hungry scientist at Wayne Industries creates a serum that turns him into a bat, he makes mayhem and jeopardizes Bruce's secret identity.
episodes.title: The Man Who Would Be Bat

episodes.synopsis: When a thief obsessed with precious diamonds uses his special freezing powers to take over Gotham, it's up to Batman to turn up the heat.
episodes.title: The Big Chill

episodes.synopsis: Batman encounters an alluring new feline foe, a sly burglar known as Catwoman, who purloins his utility belt, with wicked intentions for its use.
episodes.title: The Cat and the Bat

episodes.synopsis: Batman must take down a jet-pack-powered arsonist who attacks tech companies, while Bruce Wayne gets bad news from Gotham's mayor about his charities.
episodes.title: The Big Heat

episodes.synopsis: When a brainiac known as Cluemaster takes revenge for his defeat on a rigged quiz show, Batman must provide the answer that will save his victims.
episodes.title: Q&A

episodes.synopsis: Batman must stop a bank-robbing ventriloquist and his living puppet, who plot an epic gold heist. Alfred tries to make a love match for his boss.
episodes.title: The Big Dummy

episodes.synopsis: When Batman finds crime victims trapped in outsized playing cards, he realizes Joker has fled from the asylum with a dastardly trick up his sleeve
episodes.title: Topsy Turvy

episodes.synopsis: When Penguin breaks into Bruce Wayne's mansion and kidnaps Alfred, Gotham's guardian must morph into his alter ego during a live TV appearance.
episodes.title: Bird of Prey

episodes.synopsis: Joker's new invention terrorizes Gotham by turning everything into rubber or putty. Chief Rojas decides to rid the city of the villain -- and Batman.
episodes.title: The Rubberface of Comedy

episodes.synopsis: When Joker's putty transforms Ethan into a shape-shifting monster, Batman and Yin join forces to keep Chief Rojas from becoming his next victim.
episodes.title: The Clayface of Tragedy

episodes.synopsis: Catwoman and the Penguin team up to commit the purr-fect crime, but when Batman catches them in the act, the Penguin's true intentions are revealed.
episodes.title: The Cat, the Bat, and the Very Ugly

episodes.synopsis: Batman and Detective Yin search for answers when the Riddler leaves a trail of brainteasers in Gotham that puts the city's survival on the line.
episodes.title: Riddled

episodes.synopsis: When Firefly and Mr. Freeze join forces and threaten Gotham with eternal winter, the Dark Knight must turn up the heat on the diabolical duo.
episodes.title: Fire & Ice

episodes.synopsis: The Joker impersonates the Dark Knight, wreaking havoc all over Gotham. But his romp becomes dead serious when he injects Batman with a lethal poison.
episodes.title: The Laughing Bat

episodes.synopsis: Killer Croc, a beast that's a cross between a man and a reptile, arrives in Gotham with a deadly plan: loot the city by plunging it under water.
episodes.title: Swamped

episodes.synopsis: The Penguin taps into Man-Bat's sonar and seizes control of him. A raccoon enters the Batcave and gets its paws on vital equipment.
episodes.title: Pets

episodes.synopsis: Ethan Bennett learns that anger can run deep when he morphs back into Clayface after his supposed rehabilitation to wage a furious vendetta.
episodes.title: Meltdown

episodes.synopsis: When the Joker starts televising his criminal antics as a form of entertainment, Detective Yin's new partner soon learns it's no laughing matter.
episodes.title: JTV

episodes.synopsis: The Dark Knight faces foes in all directions, in the forms of a rubber-jointed contortionist and a flirtatious but felonious feline.
episodes.title: Ragdolls to Riches

episodes.synopsis: Alfred falls prey to the three-eyed Spellbinder, who hypnotizes him into stealing a precious artifact that would magnify the villain's evil powers.
episodes.title: The Butler Did It

episodes.synopsis: On Halloween, Batman tries to stop a fabled member of the walking dead from causing mayhem and discovers that the creature is not your average zombie.
episodes.title: Grundy's Night

episodes.synopsis: Batman uses Professor Strange's invention to enter the twisted mind of the Joker in order to free Detective Yin from the villain's clutches.
episodes.title: Strange Minds

episodes.synopsis: United by a common enemy, the Riddler, Penguin and Joker come to an agreement: Power over Gotham will go to the one who can unmask the Dark Knight.
episodes.title: Night and the City

episodes.synopsis: Barbara Gordon, the daughter of the mmissioner, relates a tale of a terrifying evildoer who's playing havoc with ecology.
episodes.title: Batgirl Begins: Part One

episodes.synopsis: When her friend, Pam, gains unnatural powers from a chemical accident, Barbara Gordon is moved to take on her Batgirl identity.
episodes.title: Batgirl Begins: Part Two

episodes.synopsis: An injury from a battle with The Penguin give Bruce Wayne amnesia, and he forgets that he is Batman. How will he save the captured Batgirl?
episodes.title: A Dark Knight to Remember

episodes.synopsis: After being allegedly cured of criminal impulses by Dr. Hugo Strange, Arnold Wesker goes to work entertaining kids, but Scarface may not be dead.
episodes.title: A Fistful of Felt

episodes.synopsis: Gearhead, a villain making use of technological assistance, robs a charity event and Batman must find a way to short-circuit the bad guy's plans.
episodes.title: RPM

episodes.synopsis: The Joker becomes more dangerous than ever when he transforms himself with the aid of Bane's injection system. It may be up to Batgirl to stop him.
episodes.title: Brawn

episodes.synopsis: Batman and Batgirl suspect Catwoman when a rare leopard is stolen. But the Joker pops up when they least expect him.
episodes.title: The Laughing Cats

episodes.synopsis: Barbara Gordon uncovers an evil scheme when the commissioner and others go gaga over greenery. She'll need Batman's help to put things right.
episodes.title: Fleurs du Mal

episodes.synopsis: Twisted toy manufacturer Cosmo Krank turns villainous and seeks vengeance on Bruce Wayne for shutting down his unsafe business.
episodes.title: Cash for Toys

episodes.synopsis: After Maximillian Zeus loses his bid for mayor of Gotham, he tries to take the city by force from above. Batman must find a way to bring him down
episodes.title: Thunder

episodes.synopsis: The Joker puts a plan into motion to create his own evil equivalent to Batgirl and finally get rid of both Batgirl and Batman for good.
episodes.title: The Apprentice

episodes.synopsis: There's a treasure waiting beneath the water in Gotham Harbor, and both The Penguin and Mr. Freeze are out to dredge it up.
episodes.title: The Icy Depths

episodes.synopsis: Hoping to put a stop to crime, Hugo Strange creates a criminally minded artificial intelligence database, but things don't go as planned.
episodes.title: Gotham's Ultimate Criminal Mastermind

episodes.synopsis: When the circus comes to town, a heartless mobster murders the parents of a young trapeze artist, and the empathetic Batman gains a faithful sidekick.
episodes.title: A Matter of Family

episodes.synopsis: Penguin gathers Gotham's nastiest villains to form an evil supersquad, in hopes of finally taking down Batman, who's building a team of his own.
episodes.title: Team Penguin

episodes.synopsis: When Ethan Bennett claims he's making a fresh start, Batman must decide if he can trust him to help stop the next incarnation of the wicked Clayface.
episodes.title: Clayfaces

episodes.synopsis: When Batman's friend is incriminated in a string of art heists, the Dark Knight tries to prove his innocence and catch the slippery true culprit.
episodes.title: The Everywhere Man

episodes.synopsis: A heinous gangster with a taste for mass destruction escapes from jail and seizes Batman, leaving Gotham's fate in the hands of Robin and Bat Girl.
episodes.title: The Breakout

episodes.synopsis: When professor Hugo Strange releases a virus that turns people into zombies, Batman takes on the impossible task of curing every citizen in Gotham.
episodes.title: Strange New World

episodes.synopsis: In the future, a fearsome villain threatens the new citizens of Gotham, who must look back to see how a hero known as Batman once protected the city.
episodes.title: Artifacts

episodes.synopsis: When Batman conquers Punch and Judy, Joker finds another potential accomplice on TV: a popular psychologist who seems ripe for his crazy mind games.
episodes.title: Two of a Kind

episodes.synopsis: When Batman and his crew are flummoxed by a common thief, they discover the secret of his criminal success and must figure out how to beat the clock.
episodes.title: Seconds

episodes.synopsis: As Riddler and Batman face death in the depths of Gotham Harbor, the Dark Knight learns the truth of their connection and must try to save them both.
episodes.title: Riddler's Revenge

episodes.synopsis: When a new crime fighter appears in Gotham with a checklist of villains to kill, Batman faces a moral dilemma. Could it be he will defend his foes?
episodes.title: Rumors

episodes.synopsis: As a cop uncovers his true identity, Bruce learns that Wayne Industries deals in alien technology. Unsure of whom to trust, Batman decides to go solo.
episodes.title: The Joining: Part One

episodes.synopsis: The fate of Gotham is on the line as the city is invaded by aliens. As he fights in vain against the assailants, Batman realizes he needs his team.
episodes.title: The Joining, Part Two

episodes.synopsis: In Gotham City, Batman and Superman find themselves working together to combat Lex Luthor, who's recruited a legion of villains to defeat Superman.
episodes.title: The Batman/Superman Story: Part One

episodes.synopsis: When Lex Luthor uses Poison Ivy's hypnotic gas to control Superman and put his plan for world domination in motion, Batman and Robin take charge.
episodes.title: The Batman/Superman Story: Part Two

episodes.synopsis: Fellow Justice Leaguer Green Arrow joins Batman in the struggle to counterbalance Count Vertigo's evil plot to put the people of Gotham off-kilter.
episodes.title: Vertigo

episodes.synopsis: Batman faces off with Firefly, now turned into radioactive supervillain Phosphorus, who has dangerous plans for Gotham City's nuclear power plant.
episodes.title: White Heat

episodes.synopsis: Flash races to Batman and Robin's aid in their mission to break up Mirror Master's fiendish plan to trap everyone inside their own mirror images.
episodes.title: A Mirror Darkly

episodes.synopsis: Batman, Robin and Batgirl find there's something funny going on when the Joker makes Gotham's citizens laugh hysterically while aiding his evil plans.
episodes.title: Joker Express

episodes.synopsis: Green Lantern sends his power ring to summon Justice League pal Batman to help him defeat archenemy Sinestro, but Penguin has another plan in mind.
episodes.title: Ring Toss

episodes.synopsis: When the Joker's mind is hacked and downloaded onto a computer it turns even more evil -- and more determined than ever to destroy Batman and Robin.
episodes.title: The Metal Face of Comedy

episodes.synopsis: Batgirl and Batman have to school three misfit college students who use mutagens to transform themselves and get even with everyone who bullied them.
episodes.title: Attack of the Terrible Trio

episodes.synopsis: Batman and Robin's evil counterparts, Wrath and Scorn, join the Joker, Penguin and other Gotham supervillains to bring down the dynamic duo.
episodes.title: The End of the Batman

episodes.synopsis: Batman and his Justice League pal, Hackman, work together to put the brakes on Black Mask and Shadow Chief's evil plans for a stolen meteorite.
episodes.title: What Goes Up...

episodes.synopsis: Something strange is making the Justice League's members start to disappear, leaving only Batman, Green Arrow and Robin left to unravel the mystery.
episodes.title: Lost Heroes: Part One

episodes.synopsis: Batman and Green Lantern guide the Justice League to regain their superpowers and prevent their android doppelgängers from taking over the world.
episodes.title: Lost Heroes: Part Two
